channel.title: Code Demos & Examples on FEWD
channel.description: Recent content in Code Demos & Examples on FEWD

item.title: Maps with MapBox
item.description: Overview Mapbox is a Javascript library that allows you to add maps to your projects Demo Application Summary This application uses Mapbox chart a map of all of the Museums in NYC. download NYC Museums Map Setup Instructions Sign up for a Mapbox account Download the demo application and save files in your class folder Add your Access Token to main.js on line 7 Run a Local Server on your computer (Required!

item.title: Carousels with Slick
item.description: Overview Slick is a Javascript plugin that makes it easy to carousels to your project. Demo Application Summary This application uses Slick to create a simple carousels of 80’s cartoons cover art. download 80’s Cartoons Carousel

item.title: Fancy Filtering & Sorting with MixitUp
item.description: Overview MixItUp is a Javascript plugin that makes it easy to adding visually appealing filter and sorting to your projects. Demo Application Summary This application uses MixItUp to create a Greek Mythology Flash card application. download Greek Mythology Flash Cards

item.title: Pinterest-style layout with Masonry
item.description: Overview Masonry is a Javascript plugin that makes it easy to create cascading grids that automatically resize as the viewport width resizes. This results in a UI layout similar to Pinterest. Demo Application Summary This application uses Masonry to create a cascading grid layout. download Masonry example
